tool_description: This API holds all news about climate change
name: 👋 Demo Project
title: 👋 Demo Project

api_list.name: Get Individual Source News
Get All Climate Change News
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://demo-project20631.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "demo-project20631.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://demo-project20631.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "demo-project20631.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
